text: Hi all! Does anyone know if its possible to adjust the default content alignment and maximum content width for ALL new sections within a Theme? Currently the default is full width but I'd like it to be something like this:

I think I figured it out! For anyone else who was wondering, if you simply define a maximum width on *".dnd-section > .row-fluid"* in your stylesheet*,* then by default, all of your content will restricted to that width. However if you click on "Center content" and define a new maximum width (by default it will be the value you set in the stylesheet) or click on "Full width", the default maximum width you set will be overridden.
You should be able to set it in the fields.json file (or theme settings in the hub settings)
